__e: I asked myself, what is this here called Holy Spirit?
Well, if the Holy Spirit is true and real, it lives through all men, pagan or not!
It won't hurt to know a little of the English language so that when you step ashore you've taken some of the burden off the holy spirit, and that can't possibly be a sin.
I thank you for believing them, Holy Father.
What about you, Holy Father, what did you want to be when you were a child?
Yes, but as you no doubt have heard, the Holy Father is dead.
- He thinks our home's the Promised Land!
Is this why you came to the Holy Land?
Do you know what lies in the Holy Land?
Now, the good news is unlike my papa and the Great Almighty, I am here for good.
Our Holy Father... must not be forgotten, neither for one day, nor for one hour.
Pray for us sinners now and at the hour of our death.

Holy Mary, mother of God... pray for us...

Mary mother of God, I have never been so cold in my life!
